org.osgi.service.remoteservices.admin
Interface ExportRegistration

public interface ExportRegistration

An Export Registration associates a service to a local endpoint. The Export Registration can be used to delete the endpoint associated with an this registration. It is created with theRemoteServiceAdmin.exportService(org.osgi.framework.ServiceReference) method. When this Export Registration has been unregistered, the methods must all return null.

Method Summary
 EndpointDescription getEndpointDescription()
          Return the Endpoint Description that is created for this registration.
 org.osgi.framework.ServiceReference getExportedService()
          Return the service being exported.
 void unregister()
          Delete the local endpoint and disconnect any remote distribution providers.
 

Method Detail

getExportedService

org.osgi.framework.ServiceReference getExportedService()
Return the service being exported.

Returns:
The service being exported, must be null when this registration is unregistered.

getEndpointDescription

EndpointDescription getEndpointDescription()
Return the Endpoint Description that is created for this registration.

Returns:
the local Endpoint Description

unregister

void unregister()
Delete the local endpoint and disconnect any remote distribution providers. After this method returns, all the methods must return null. This method has no effect when the endpoint is already destroyed or being destroyed.
